item.title: About
item.description: Hey ! Eager to know about me? Let me tell you about myself. I’m Mohamed Izad, a Final year undergraduate at the Faculty of Science, University of Colombo, majoring in Biochemistry. I’m a passionate and hard-working individual who would like to discover more about Science while accomplishing my personal career goals. I’m also working as a freelancer at Fiverr, using my unique set of skills. I like to explore, read, code, and travel around the world.

item.title: Blog
item.description: Hey ! It seems you are interested in reading what I have written. You can visit my Medium profile. Also I’m dropping few links of my work here, so you can enjoy the read ! Bioinformatics in Plant Science Rêves(Dreams), into a French world La vie (Life), into a French world Let them fly to make the world a better place “Not Afraid” – Eminem Online இல் கழிந்த ஒரு வருடம்… The cutest in the animal kingdom A visit to the desert
